INVESTING 101

Latest articles and insights about investing 101

Frequently Asked Questions

How does art investing work?

Art investing involves purchasing shares of fine art with the potential for appreciation. Through our platform, you can own fractional shares of authenticated masterpieces, diversifying your portfolio with this unique asset class.

What are the minimum investment requirements?

You can start investing with as little as $500. This allows you to build a diversified art portfolio across multiple artists and styles without requiring significant capital.

How is the art authenticated and valued?

Our team of experts conducts thorough due diligence on each artwork, including authentication, condition assessment, and market analysis. We work with leading art specialists and use advanced technology to ensure accurate valuations.

What happens when an artwork is sold?

When an artwork is sold, net proceeds are distributed to investors proportionally based on their ownership stake. Our team actively monitors market conditions to identify optimal selling opportunities.

How do I track my investments?

Through your personalized dashboard, you can monitor your portfolio performance, track individual artwork valuations, and receive regular updates on market conditions and potential selling opportunities.
